name: Ecchi Girls
detailed_description:
Ecchi Girls

Is a puzzle puzzle game. But unlike other games of this genre there are many innovations.

Game Features:

— There is a unique system of movement of the camera on the table.
— Special gallery with pictures.
— Each level is unique in its own way.
— Also in our game there is a pleasant sound that will completely relax you during the passage of levels.
— After completing the puzzle you will be able to see the picture you have collected in more detail!



In our game you will see a lot of beautiful girls and the number of updates will increase.

short_description: Welcome to the incredible world of Ecchi Girls. Immersed in the game, you can find your new wife and forget about all the external problems.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8 (8.1) / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (2.9 GHz) or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1.66 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1.66 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
